title: Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers love this cardigan's style, with one describing it as a cute slouchy oversized piece that sits perfectly below the waist. Customers appreciate the color options, with one highlighting the dark buttons that complement the rich khaki shade.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love It!
items.body: I love this cardigan. I'm 5' 4.5" tall and the length is perfect. It's lightweight, but the ribbing gives it an attractive bulky look. The dark buttons set off the rich khaki color in a nice way. Ideal for indoors or wearing under a jacket. It was sort of stiff and scratchy when I first tried it on, but one machine wash softened it and made it comfortable and cozy. Great value. Highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Camille

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Orange and pink adorable cardigan
items.body: Cute and fit right. I thought it was going to be fuzzy, but it’s a very silky yarn and nice. Read more
items.author: Tina Denny

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tan oversized cardigan
items.body: Probably my favorite fall sweater. I tend to purchase size Medium for a longer length and looser fit but I trusted Amazon’s suggestion and grabbed a small. It’s great, thick quality and even after a wash, the quality doesn’t disappoint. I did not dry in the dryer, and allowed it to air dry. It’s the prettiest tan colored sweater and I love the loose cardigan look. I paired it with a light pair of Levi jeans and I would definitely recommend this product. I am 5’1” and 113 pounds for reference. Read more
items.author: Krisi Kuchlenz

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater. Glad I got it.
items.body: Soft and perfectly oversized but not too long. It is somewhat thin, don’t expect it to be very warm but perfect for layering/wearing in school or office setting for a little bit of cozy coverage. The beige color is warm without looking too khaki. Aldi came in vacuum sealed so it definitely cannot be worn right away. I got a large and I love the oversized fit and it’s not too long or too loose. Daughter loves it on me, said it’s really cute. Read more
items.author: Jessa88

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars No for me.
items.body: Cute cardigan but it felt kind of itchy to me and the color is very orange so I sent back. Read more
items.author: Ashley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater!
items.body: Super soft, chunky and cozy. Just need to wear an undershirt. Read more
items.author: Kari M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy cropped sweater
items.body: I love this sweater. More specifically the color. I was looking for a sweater that matches my Uggs. So this sweater would look good styles up with boots or Uggs. Nice material, it’s soft and not cheap looking. Size is true to size, cropped sweater. Read more
items.author: JOHN K BURNS

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheaply made & incredibly ugly in person
items.body: You can tell its cheaply made using a really cheap plastic type material. And it takes "over-sized" to an all new level. I ordered a medium, which is my normal size, & this thing is huge. Returned it for a small in a different color, & its still entirely way too big. These are quite possibly the ugliest cardigans I've ever seen. Read more
items.author: David

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Apricot, B_khaki, Rose, Army Green, Light Green, Black, Light Orange, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Bright Blue, Wine Red, Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
